Class TimerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androiddevbook.onyourbike.chapter5.model.TimerState

  • public class TimerState
extends java.lang.Object
    TimerState State of the timer in the On Your Bike application.     • Method Detail

      • elapsedTime

        public long elapsedTime()
        Return the current elapsed time. This is based off the current time if the timer is running and off the last time the timer was stopped if its not running.
        Returns:
        Time since timer started.

      • seconds

        public long seconds()
        Convenience function.
        Returns:
        Seconds elapsed since last call to elapsedTime.

      • minutes

        public long minutes()
        Convenience function.
        Returns:
        Minutes elapsed since last call to elapsedTime.

      • hours

        public long hours()
        Convenience function.
        Returns:
        Hours elapsed since last call to elapsedTime.

      • display

        public java.lang.String display()
        Calculates and returns a formatted elapsed time string for display.
        Returns:
        Formatted elapsed time.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets (and stops) the timer.

      • start

        public void start()
        States the timer.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the timer.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        True if the timer is running, false if the timer is not.
